div.head: 油傷火灼
div.div: harm following scorching by oil and fire

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: harm following scorching by oil and fire

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with tang huo shang 湯火傷 , harm caused by boiling water and fire. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry shi gao 石膏 : quotes Mei shi fang 梅師方 : 油傷火灼：痛不可忍。石膏末傅 之，良 , “For harm following scorching by oil and fire : When the pain is unbearable apply shi gao powder to it. Excellent”.
